meanings.sent1: The magician made the rabbit disappeared from the hat.
meanings.sent2: The sun disappeared behind the clouds.
meanings.sent3: The cookies disappeared from the jar, much to the delight of the children.
meanings.sent4: Her worries disappeared like mist in the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The stars disappeared one by one as the sky brightened with dawn.

meanings.sent1: The hiker disappeared into the dense forest.
meanings.sent2: The boat disappeared over the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream disappeared quickly on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent4: His voice disappeared into the howling wind.
meanings.sent5: The old ruins disappeared into the overgrown vegetation.
